Posts.EditableText: This is an original unlike the last one I posted, all the music was written, performed and produced by me. Please don't pay much attention to the vocals, I'm a poor singer with a sore throat, the results aren't very pretty. Hopefully I'll get somebody to replace the vocals on all my songs soon (If I can pursuade Rob to come round and do it). It's the first proper song I've produced with my new digital recording equipment, and I think it's pretty good standard. http://www.nevetsweb.com/hosted/steve/secretegoman.mp3
Posts.HTML:
This is an original unlike the last one I posted, all the music was written, performed and produced by me.

Please don't pay much attention to the vocals, I'm a poor singer with a sore throat, the results aren't very pretty. Hopefully I'll get somebody to replace the vocals on all my songs soon (If I can pursuade Rob to come round and do it).

It's the first proper song I've produced with my new digital recording equipment, and I think it's pretty good standard.

http://www.nevetsweb.com/hosted/steve/secretegoman.mp3

Posts.EditableText: Nice tune. It could use some lead guitar work, IMO... other than that it's pretty good.
Posts.HTML: Nice tune. It could use some lead guitar work, IMO... other than that it's pretty good.
